original_text: This is the message of God's good news: Gentiles, as well as Jews, may receive the good things that God has prepared for his children. We may all belong to the same group of God's people, like we are his body. Everyone who is united with Christ Jesus receives the good things that God has promised.
korean_text: 이는 이방인들이 복음으로 말미암아 그리스도 예수 안에서 함께 상속자가 되고 함께 지체가 되고 함께 약속에 참여하는 자가 됨이라

sentences.original_text: This is the message of God's good news:
that God has prepared for his children.
We may all belong to the same group
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모두 같은 그룹에 속할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Everyone who is united with Christ Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도 예수와 하나가 된 모든 사람은
